Package main

Class Outpost

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Outpost
  • public class Outpost
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Outpost area of the space exploration game. This is where items such as medkits and foods are bought. Holds the list of medkits and foods that is sold.
    Version:
    1.2, May 2019
    Author:
    Raymond Jr Tamse, Rchi Lugtu

    • Method Detail

      • initItems

        public void initItems()
        Initialises the outpost, and creates objects of types MedKit and Food that will be sold. Adds medkits to the medkit list and foods to the foods list.
